info.title: My API
info.description: Documentation automatically generated by the swagger-autogen module.

get.description: Renders the home page with a title.

post.description: Post for registered users to be able to login. Both email/username and password need to be correct. After successful login, the JWT token is returned - use it later in Authorization header to access the other endoints.
User registration endpoint. Registers a new user with required fields such as firstname, lastname, email, username, address, phone and password.

401.description: Bad request - Missing required fiields or invalid data.

get.description: Gets the list of all roles.
Gets the list of all memebership.
Gets the list of all users.

put.description: Updates the user of ID provided in the path.

get.description: Gets the list of all categories.

put.description: Updates the category of ID or category name provided in the path. It can be either category name or ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID or category name of the specific category to change/update

delete.description: Deletes the category of ID provided in the path.

get.description: Gets the list of all brands.

put.description: Updates the brand of ID or barnd name provided in the path. It can be a brand name or ID.

delete.description: Deletes the brand of ID provided in the path.

get.description: Gets the list of all products.
Gets the products of name provided in the path.

put.description: Updates the product of ID provided in the path.

delete.description: Deletes the product of ID provided in the path.

post.description: Creates a new cart for a user.

500.description: Failed to check out the cart

result.example: Failed to check out the cart

get.description: Returns a the list of the user orders.

put.description: Updates the status of a specific order by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the specific user's order

parameters.name: OrderStatus
parameters.description: New status to update the order with

get.description: Returns a the list of all order statuses.

post.description: Searches for the product by products name, brand or specified category.
